bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Low-Voltage AC Power Circuit Breakers Used in Enclosures Amendment 1: Increase of Voltages to 1000 V AC and Below
IEEE Standard for Low-Voltage AC Power Circuit Breakers Used in Enclosures Amendment 1: Increase of Voltages to 1000 V AC and Below
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C37.13a-2012 (Amendment to IEEE Std C37.13-2008)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The addition of the maximum voltages of 1058 V, 730 V and nominal voltages of 1000 V, 690 V are addressed in this amendment. Updates are made with respect to the dielectric test voltages.

Amendment to IEEE Std C37.13-2008. The addition of the maximum voltages of 1058 V, 730 V and nominal voltages of 1000 V, 690 V are addressed in this amendment. Updates are made with respect to the dielectric test voltages.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
